concept.title: How should I use the Data Collector?
concept.shortdesc: Use the like a pipe in the data stream. Throughout your enterprise data topology, you have streams of data that you need to move, collect, and process on the way to their destinations. The provides the crucial connection between hops in the stream.

conbody.p: To solve your ingest needs, you can use a single to run one or more pipelines. Or you might install a series of s to stream data across your enterprise data topology.
